en.samlabs.name: SAM Labs
en.samlabs.setLEDColor: set [num] status color to R [red], G [green], B [blue]
en.samlabs.setLEDRGBColor: set RGB LED [num] color to R [red], G [green], B [blue]
en.samlabs.setBlockServo: set servo motor [num] angle to [val] deg

es.samlabs.name: SAM Labs
es.samlabs.setLEDColor: [num] establecer el color del LED: rojo[red], verde[green], azul[blue]
es.samlabs.setLEDRGBColor: configurar LED RGB[num] color: rojo[red], verde[green], azul[blue]

it.samlabs.name: SAM Labs
it.samlabs.setLEDColor: [num] impostare colore del LED: rosso[red], verde[green], blu[blue]
it.samlabs.setLEDRGBColor: impostare colore RGB LED [num] : rosso[red], verde[green], blu[blue]
